app.title: Social Hub
app.description: Manage your social media posts, view schedules, and test API connections.

accounts.title: Account Connections
accounts.description: Connect Facebook Pages, Instagram Business accounts, and LinkedIn organizations used by your scheduled posts.
accounts.helper: You only enter App ID + App Secret in the provider consoles. Page IDs and access tokens are obtained during OAuth and stored as socialnt:account.

facebook.title: Facebook Pages
facebook.body: Opens Facebook login, lists managed Pages, then stores the selected Page access token.

instagram.title: Instagram Business
instagram.body: Requires the Instagram Business account that is linked to a Facebook Page; fetches the IG business ID and token.

linkedin.title: LinkedIn
linkedin.body: Signs in to LinkedIn and returns either your member URN or the organizations you can administer for company posts.
linkedin.scopes: Scopes: openid, profile, email, w_member_social, r_organization_social, rw_organization_admin

list.title: Connected accounts
list.empty: No accounts stored yet. Connect a platform above to create socialnt:account entries.
list.label: Label

posts.emptyDescription: Create social posts in Jahia to see them here.

calendar.emptyDescription: Posts with scheduled dates will appear here.

proxyTest.title: Social API Proxy Test
proxyTest.description: Test the social media proxy by making authenticated requests to external APIs.

activityLog.title: Activity Log
activityLog.description: Track all publishing attempts, successes, failures, and status changes for social posts.
activityLog.confirmFlush: Are you sure you want to delete all activity logs? This action cannot be undone.

insights.selectPostDescription: Choose a published post from the list to view its insights and analytics data.
insights.noDataDescription: Insights data may not be available yet. Try again later or check if the post ID is correct.
